title: GoaticMonkey
name: goaticmonkey
description: An addon providing a light HTTP-based API for Firefox
author: Balint Erdosi

preferences.name: keyStrings
preferences.title: Key Strings
preferences.description: If you wish to allow an application to interact with Firefox, please add its key string here. Only do so for trusted applications. Make sure to separate key strings with semicolons, and add one at the end, too.
